title: This shouldn't be happening
body:
Does riot think its funny when they disconnect someone for 15 mins and give them a leaverbuster? Now i know leaverbuster is automated and is based on leaving but thats because I just worked one off. In a match i only played 20 out of 35 minutes i got third most damage and only 1k less gold then the enemy top laner and I'm still busted??? I get the whole auto punish but cmon you can't disconnect me from your servers and say "hey we are sorry you couldn't connect so to brighten your day we added a punishment so you can think for 20 minutes before 5 games what a mistake you made choosing LoL as the game to play."

I'm not complaining about LeaverBuster, its a fair punishment. I'm not complaining about the fights between my internet and the servers.
I'm complaining that these 2 are mixing and reallllllllllllllllllly pissing me off

replies.body:
Disconnections usually don't come from the server end, but usually are from the local client's end when it drops its connection to the server. There are a number of local network settings that can cause disconnections, and we've outlined the most common fixes for disconnections inside our [troubleshooting guide.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)

Let me know if those steps caused any change in your issue.
It turns out it was my wifi, though it is going through some problems. It's supposed to be the best internet my provider has to offer, but it's done crap for me

While WiFi is super convenient, it's prone to causing a lot of problems for game that rely heavily on a stable connection such as League. We have an awesome article on the differences between Ethernet and WiFi [here.](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/ethernet-vs-wifi-ping-packets-playing-better)

Let me know if you have any questions.
